name: part_006
file: tmp_【 チラ見せ】大神ミオ 1st Live.「Our Sparkle」ぴあアリーナMM [pChQkIDyOJA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Opening countdown and loading sequence with the audience chanting and waving lightsticks.
Animated opening movie featuring Mio in various crystal-themed scenes.
Performance of the song 'Howling' after a brief opening shout to the audience.

subtitles.original: Mio LOADING
subtitles.english: Mio LOADING

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: OUR SPARKLE Ookami Mio 1st Live.
subtitles.english: OUR SPARKLE Ookami Mio 1st Live.

subtitles.original: しじまに響いてよ My Howling
subtitles.english: Echo through the silence, my howling

subtitles.original: 大神ミオ1stソロライブ、始まるよー！
subtitles.english: Ookami Mio's 1st Solo Live starts now!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: そっと流れゆく風景 切な的な
subtitles.english: The scenery flows softly, sentimental

subtitles.original: 日々の中で
subtitles.english: within the days.

subtitles.original: 差し伸べられた手は優しく 鼓動に浸る
subtitles.english: The hand reached out to me was gentle, soaking into my heartbeat,

subtitles.original: 微熱の予感
subtitles.english: a premonition of a slight fever.

subtitles.original: 風に攫われる そう生きてきたから
subtitles.english: Swept away by the wind, that's how I've lived,

subtitles.original: 君に会って気づく もう一人じゃない
subtitles.english: but meeting you, I realized I'm not alone anymore.

subtitles.original: さあ今 瞬きは超え かき消す月へ響く
subtitles.english: Now, beyond a blink, echoing to the drowning moon,

subtitles.original: つま弾く満ち欠け 今の胸 共に投げく夜
subtitles.english: plucking the waxing and waning, this heart, this night we grieve together.

subtitles.original: 遠く伝播する想いは 心強くさせる
subtitles.english: Thoughts propagating afar make me feel reassured.

subtitles.original: 付いておいでよ 後ろに君がいるから
subtitles.english: Follow me, because you are behind me,

subtitles.original: 私は迷わない
subtitles.english: I won't hesitate,

subtitles.original: 光射す道へ
subtitles.english: towards the path where light shines.

subtitles.original: 無力だから仲間を求め 凍えるから
subtitles.english: Because I'm powerless, I seek companions; because I'm freezing,

subtitles.original: 火を灯して
subtitles.english: light a fire.

subtitles.original: 変化と共に進化してく この顛末は
subtitles.english: Evolving along with change, this outcome

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない
subtitles.english: no one knows.

subtitles.original: 君を信じる そう決めているから
subtitles.english: I believe in you, because I've decided to,

subtitles.original: どんな非常非情をも 乗り越えられるよ
subtitles.english: I can overcome any cruelty or harshness.

subtitles.original: げっこう この闇に唯一 凛と咲く花
subtitles.english: Moonlight, the only flower blooming gallantly in this darkness.

subtitles.original: 恐れなのか憧れなのか 向き合う夜空
subtitles.english: Is it fear or is it longing? Facing the night sky.

subtitles.original: 大地を駆け抜ける私と 君が作り出す
subtitles.english: As I run across the earth, you and I create

subtitles.original: この物語 単純な未来じゃない 湧き立つ情熱
subtitles.english: this story, it's not a simple future, but a surging passion.

subtitles.original: この声に乗せよう
subtitles.english: I'll put it in this voice.

subtitles.original: 空飛ぶ羽なくても 手を繋げられたから
subtitles.english: Even without wings to fly, since we could hold hands,

subtitles.original: この運命を選んだ
subtitles.english: I chose this destiny.

subtitles.original: 連想する遠吠えは しじまに響いて
subtitles.english: Associated howls echo through the silence,

subtitles.original: 何度も何度も その絆を確かめ合った
subtitles.english: time and again, we confirmed that bond.
